com.example.android_sdk.Utils

Class HttpUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.android_sdk.Utils.HttpUtils

  • public class HttpUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Helper class used to create HTTP calls

    This class handles interaction with the Checkout.com API

    • Method Detail

      • generateGooglePayToken

        public void generateGooglePayToken(java.lang.String key,
                                   java.lang.String url,
                                   java.lang.String body)
                            throws org.json.JSONException
        Used to do a HTTP call with the card details

        This method will perform an HTTP POST request to the Checkout.com API. The API call is async so it will us the callback to communicate the result This method is used to generate a card token

        Parameters:
        key - the public key of the customer
        url - the request URL
        body - the body of the request as a JSON String
        Throws:
        org.json.JSONException

      • generateToken

        public void generateToken(java.lang.String key,
                          java.lang.String url,
                          java.lang.String body)
                   throws org.json.JSONException
        Used to do a HTTP call with the Google Pay's payload

        This method will perform an HTTP POST request to the Checkout.com API. The API call is async so it will us the callback to communicate the result. This method is used to generate a token for Google Pay

        Parameters:
        key - the public key of the customer
        url - the request URL
        body - the body of the request as a JSON String
        Throws:
        org.json.JSONException

      • setTokenListener

        public void setTokenListener(CheckoutKit.OnTokenGenerated listener)
        Used to set the callback listener for when the card token is generated

      • setGooglePayTokenListener

        public void setGooglePayTokenListener(CheckoutKit.OnGooglePayTokenGenerated listener)
        Used to set the callback listener for when the token for Google Pay is generated
